attributes.action: New referendum for changing the voting system to proportionate representation.
attributes.additional_details:
Our current system of voting does not actually represent what the voters want.
Parties do not gain a fair representation of the votes in Parliament.
The winning party can get in with as little as 43% of the votes and MP's can get in with only 35%.
Our current system does not encourage people voting as many believe their candidate have little chance of being elected.
attributes.background:
Change our unfair and three party dominated electoral method of voting.
Give minority parties and independent candidates a better chance of winning seats in Parliament and lessen the dominance of the big three parties, Labour, Conservative and Liberal Democrats.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700109
